hero.title: Transforming Smiles with Precision, Creating Confident Futures
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class dental treatments in Istanbul with Avenue Clinic—where your oral health and aesthetics come first, at prices up to 70% lower than global averages.

treatments.title: OUR TREATMENTS
treatments.subtitle: Advanced dental care designed for every unique smile

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.description: Dental implants are the most effective long-term solution for missing teeth, offering strength, stability, and a completely natural appearance.

hero.title: Rediscover Comfort and Confidence with Dental Implants
hero.description: Avenue Clinic offers expertly placed dental implants that look, feel, and function like natural teeth. Fused directly into the jawbone, our implants provide a secure foundation for a healthier, more confident smile—whether you're replacing one tooth or several.

benefits.title: The Lasting Advantages of Choosing Dental Implants
benefits.description: Dental implants provide a reliable and permanent alternative to traditional dentures or bridges. They restore full functionality, protect your jawbone from deterioration, and elevate your smile’s aesthetics. With proper care, they can last decades—making them a smart and secure investment in your oral health.

natural_appearance.title: Authentic-Looking Smile
natural_appearance.description: Each implant is custom-designed to match your existing teeth in color and shape, creating a seamless and attractive result.

improved_chewing.title: Eat Without Restrictions
improved_chewing.description: Enjoy your favorite foods again—implants are strong enough to handle everyday meals without slipping or discomfort.

enhanced_speech.title: Speak Naturally
enhanced_speech.description: Implants stay firmly in place, helping you pronounce words clearly and avoid the speech issues associated with dentures.

long_lasting.title: Durable and Dependable
long_lasting.description: With good hygiene and regular check-ups, implants can last a lifetime—making them one of the most durable treatments available.

jawbone_health.title: Protects Bone Density
jawbone_health.description: Dental implants stimulate your jawbone just like natural roots, preventing bone loss and supporting your facial structure.

easy_maintenance.title: No Special Care Needed
easy_maintenance.description: Maintain implants just like your natural teeth with daily brushing, flossing, and routine dental visits.

transformation.title: Dental Implant Transformations
transformation.description: Take a look at real-life before and after photos from our dental implant patients. Each transformation showcases the power of modern implant technology in restoring smiles and confidence.

smileMakeover.title: Smile Makeover
smileMakeover.description: A customized combination of cosmetic procedures designed to completely transform your smile’s appearance, balance, and harmony.

dentalVeneers.title: Dental Veneers
dentalVeneers.description: Veneers are ultra-thin, custom-made shells that enhance the front of your teeth—perfect for a bright, symmetrical, and naturally flawless look.

allOnImplants.title: All-on-4/6 Implants
allOnImplants.description: A full-arch restoration using 4 or 6 strategically placed implants, offering a fixed and aesthetic solution for total tooth loss.

dentalCrowns.title: Dental Crowns
dentalCrowns.description: Crowns are custom restorations that cover weakened or damaged teeth, restoring their strength, function, and natural beauty.

surgicalDentistry.title: Surgical Dentistry
surgicalDentistry.description: Complex treatments like extractions, bone grafts, and soft tissue surgeries—handled with care by our skilled surgical team.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: Modern dental solutions designed with your time and comfort in mind

items.title: SAME DAY DENTISTRY
items.description: Enjoy high-quality dental care delivered in a single visit—perfect for busy schedules without compromising results.

items.title: SPECIALIST CONSULTATION
items.description: Meet directly with our experienced dental specialists to receive tailored recommendations for your smile goals.

items.title: ONLINE APPOINTMENT
items.description: Submit your preferred date and time, and our team will follow up quickly to confirm and finalize your booking.

about.label: About Us
about.title: World-Class Dental Care That Fits Your Life and Budget.
about.description: Avenue Clinic offers a unique blend of advanced dental technology and compassionate, patient-first care. Our skilled team delivers exceptional results across general, cosmetic, and specialized treatments—using trusted international materials at prices up to 70% below global averages, right here in Istanbul.

cards.title: Our Mission
cards.description: To provide high-quality dental care that is accessible, personalized, and delivered with compassion—helping every patient achieve a healthier, more confident smile.

cards.title: Our Vision
cards.description: To become a global leader in affordable, top-tier dentistry—shaping smiles, building trust, and redefining what patients expect from care in both comfort and quality.

cards.title: Our Value
cards.description: We believe in honesty, empathy, and individualized care. Every patient at Avenue Clinic is treated with transparency, respect, and the attention they truly deserve.

about.healthy_smiles_trust: Guided by a Mission to Inspire Healthy Smiles and Long-Term Trust.

expertise.label: EXPERTISE
expertise.title: Skilled Dental Care Backed by Real Experience
expertise.description: At Avenue Clinic, our focus is on delivering reliable dental care through practical experience and a team-based approach. Each department includes qualified dentists with focused expertise, working together to provide well-rounded care for both routine and complex treatments.

features.title: Dedicated Professionals in Each Field
features.description: Our dental team includes experienced professionals across various branches of dentistry. From general care to more specific treatments, each patient receives attention from someone who understands their condition and treatment options.

features.title: Modern Tools for Better Accuracy
features.description: We use up-to-date dental technology—including imaging and diagnostic tools—to improve accuracy and comfort in every procedure. This helps us offer treatment plans based on clear, detailed evaluations.

whyUs.label: WHY CHOOSE US
whyUs.title: Reliable Dental Care with Honest Pricing
whyUs.description: Receive dependable dental treatment that blends proven techniques, experienced professionals, and trusted materials—all offered at fair prices to make excellent care more widely available.

professionals.title: Qualified Dental Team
professionals.description: Our dentists bring practical experience and up-to-date knowledge to provide safe, effective care for patients of all needs.

satisfaction.title: Patient-Focused Approach
satisfaction.description: We listen, explain clearly, and make sure you're comfortable at every step—so you feel supported throughout your treatment.

materials.title: Trusted, Durable Materials
materials.description: We use well-established, high-quality dental materials to ensure both safety and long-term results you can rely on.

patientJourney.label: PATIENT JOURNEY
patientJourney.title: Your Journey with Avenue Clinic
patientJourney.description: Begin a smooth and supportive experience where your comfort, safety, and satisfaction come first. From a personalized online consultation to expert treatment and attentive post-care, every step at Avenue Clinic is designed to make your dental journey in Türkiye easy and worry-free.

slide1.title: #1 - Online Consultation
slide1.description: Start from home with a personalized online consultation. Our multilingual support team will guide you through your options and answer any questions, ensuring you feel informed and confident before traveling.

slide2.title: #2 - Arrival and Transfer
slide2.description: Upon arrival in Türkiye, you’ll be greeted by our team and assisted with a comfortable, pre-arranged transfer to your hotel. We work with quality accommodations to make sure your stay begins stress-free.

slide3.title: #3 - Accommodation
slide3.description: Enjoy a relaxing stay in a hotel chosen for its comfort and convenience. We’ve partnered with trusted locations to give you the space to rest, recover, and feel at ease during your treatment process.

slide4.title: #4 - Clinical Consultation
slide4.description: At Avenue Clinic, your in-person consultation includes a full review of your treatment plan and oral health goals. Our dentists take the time to explain each step and make sure you’re fully comfortable moving forward.

slide5.title: #5 - The Procedure
slide5.description: Your procedure is carried out by experienced dental professionals using modern equipment and up-to-date techniques to ensure a safe, effective, and satisfying outcome.

slide6.title: #6 - Check-Up
slide6.description: After your treatment, we provide a thorough check-up to make sure everything is healing properly. Your comfort and satisfaction are our priorities, and we’re here to answer any questions before you return home.

slide7.title: #7 - Departure
slide7.description: As your visit concludes, you’ll leave with a renewed smile and the confidence of knowing your care was handled by a team that values comfort, quality, and support—every step of the way at Avenue Clinic.

transformation.title: Remarkable Results That Reflect True Smile Transformations

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: Partnering with industry-leading dental companies to deliver exceptional quality and innovative solutions

contact.title: Get Your Free Dental Report
contact.subtitle: Send us your details to receive a personalized treatment quote and plan.

faq.title: Everything You Need to Know About Our Treatments
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about procedures, care, pricing, and planning in our FAQ section.

treatments.question: What types of dental treatments do you offer?
treatments.answer: Avenue Clinic provides a full range of dental services, including preventive care, cosmetic procedures, restorative treatments, and oral surgery. These include dental implants, veneers, crowns, teeth whitening, orthodontics, and complete smile makeovers. Each plan is tailored to match your dental needs and goals.

affordability.question: Are your treatments affordable compared to other countries?
affordability.answer: Yes, Avenue Clinic offers high-quality dental care at rates up to 70% lower than in many Western countries. We maintain high standards by working with trusted international brands, making excellent dental care more accessible.

rightTreatment.question: How do I know which dental treatment is right for me?
rightTreatment.answer: Our team will guide you through a thorough consultation and diagnostic process. With the help of modern imaging and evaluations, we'll suggest the best treatment options to meet your goals, whether they involve function, aesthetics, or both.

materials.question: Do you use high-quality materials for dental treatments?
materials.answer: Yes. We use high-grade materials from globally recognized manufacturers. Our focus is on delivering safe, long-lasting results that both look and feel natural.

duration.question: How long does it take to complete dental treatments?
duration.answer: Treatment time varies based on your individual case and procedure. Some treatments, like veneers, can be completed in a few days. Others, such as implants or orthodontics, may take several months. We'll explain the full timeline during your consultation.
